decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: Site Location Plan, B156507-3000 (Existing and Proposed Block Plan), B156507-1100 (Existing Plans), B156507-3100 (Proposed Plans), Planning Fire Safety Strategy dated June 2023.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The hereby approved three rooflights to the south-western rooflslope of the approved development and rear outrigger shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the  area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Single storey rear infill and extension (following demolition of existing rear structure); internal and external alterations, and insertion of rooflight to rear outrigger roofslope
